name: Wild Guns Reloaded
summary:
"Wild Guns is a fast paced gallery style shooter mixing the Wild West with steampunk. Players can play as Clint, Annie, Dorris or Bullet, or all together in multiplayer action! Each can jump, dive and roll to get out of the way of the barrage of bullets enemies let fly – or shoot them down with their own gun! 
 
With eight stages, each with three zones, there's plenty of bad robots to blast away. With a true arcade game feel, Wild Guns was the first sci-fi western to arrive on home consoles and, to this day, there really isn't any other game like it!"
storyline: "Annie has tracked down the famed bounty hunter Clint to get revenge on the Kid gang."

esrb.synopsis: This is an arcade-style shooter game in which players seek revenge on a robot gang. From a third-person perspective, players move their characters side to side while jumping and shooting at enemies in each level. Characters use pistols and machine guns that fire slow-moving projectiles; a handful of characters throw explosives such as grenades or sticks of dynamite. Characters fall over and disappear when defeated, and some robots break into metal pieces when destroyed.
